overview: An egoistic fetish photographer named Peter has a penchant for high-end drugs and sexy hot women. Peter takes photos of hot sexy models and sells the photos to his publisher. Spending heavily to pursue his lavish lifestyle Peters world comes crashing down after his publisher rejects his latest photographic work. Now Peter has no choice but to turn to his dreaded mother for financial help.
tagline: Depraved. Deranged. With an Appetite for SIN!
title: The Sex Merchants
